name: CsMonitoringHbA1c
title: Code System - Monitoring glycated haemoglobin (HbA1c) T1D
description: Manzana monitoring glycated haemoglobin (HbA1c) for the type 1 diabetes

concept.definition: The term HbA1c refers to glycated haemoglobin. It develops when haemoglobin, a protein within red blood cells that carries oxygen throughout your body, joins with glucose in the blood, becoming ‘glycated’.
